message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. We believe this is a fair price considering its value, and we're confident it will meet your needs. Let us know if you're interested in proceeding.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept your offer of $130 for the product. I believe this is a mutually beneficial arrangement. Please let me know if you agree to proceed with this purchase.
